CustomField.description: Set the log level for which a rflib_Log_Event__c Platform Event should be published asynchronously. Any log statement that is added, meets the reporting log level, and encompassed by set this level, i.e. reporting log level of WARN will match for WARN and ERROR messages, will publish the log event using a Queueable. Note, this will count towards your Async Apex Governor limit.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the log level for which the Log Event Platform Event will be created using a Queueable. Valid values are NONE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, and FATAL. If this level does not match, the event will be published synchronously using a DML statement.
CustomField.label: Async Log Event Reporting Level
